keyword: how many calories is in one oreo
title: How Many Calories in One Oreo?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in one oreo—about 53 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for this classic cookie.
h1: How Many Calories in One Oreo?
assumptions: Standard Oreo cookie (regular, not double-stuffed), approximately 11 g, creme-filled chocolate sandwich.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, variety (e.g., double-stuf, flavors), and manufacturing; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One standard Oreo cookie contains about 53 calories, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories is in one oreo?
What are the carbs in one Oreo?
faqs.a: About 7.3 g total carbs, including 3.9 g sugars and 0.3 g fiber.
Yes, a small amount—0.7 g per cookie from the wafers.

faqs.q: How much fat is in one oreo cookie?
faqs.a: 2.5 g total fat, with 0.4 g saturated fat and 0 g trans fat.
No cholesterol (0 mg) in standard Oreos, as they're plant-based.
